packages.title: Restart — 3 sessions
highlights: Confidence reset and story refresh after a gap

packages.title: Sustain — 12 sessions
highlights: Cadence for balancing care duties and work

policies: Rescheduling: 24 hours’ notice; late changes count as used.
Blocks may pause between sessions by mutual agreement.
Confidential by default; minimal notes; deletion on request.
Coaching, not therapy; signposting if therapy/legal advice is safer.
Online within UK hours; invoicing in GBP.

checklist: 50–60 minutes available online, UK hours workable.
A gap to bridge (parenting, health, study, care) and a target domain.
Willing to try one micro-experiment between sessions.
Recent CV or LinkedIn link ready to share.
Able to use Google Docs/Sheets and Zoom/Meet.
Consent to minimal notes and data handling.
what_to_prepare: Your LinkedIn URL or a recent CV (PDF).
Two short examples from before/after the gap.
Rough weekly rhythm you can keep.
Top 3 questions for the first two sessions.
signals: You want calm, honest, UK-relevant guidance.
You prefer small steps that produce visible proof.
You can commit to a weekly cadence with short reviews.
You are comfortable with “coaching, not therapy”.

process.title: How the process works
process.description: A three to four month container with 60-minute sessions and light touch check-ins between calls.
steps: Reset & boundaries — aims, constraints, what sits outside coaching.
Rebuild signal — one visible proof point (mini-project, reference, refresher).
Story & CV — bridge the gap without apologising; clear “why now”.
Interview fit — return-to-work scenarios, timing, breaks, care duties.
Apply & review — track, 20-min retro, adjust the next small step.
process.note: Optional asynchronous feedback through voice notes or docs helps you integrate between sessions.

sections.title: Scope & Fit
paragraphs: This is coaching, not therapy, counselling, HR, or legal advice.
We work on UK-relevant proof points, story clarity, preparation, and cadence.
If therapy/legal support is safer, we will signpost appropriate services.

sections.title: Confidentiality
paragraphs: Sessions are confidential by default.
Only minimal notes are kept; you may request deletion at any time.
Quality supervision may use anonymised patterns without identifying details.

sections.title: Scheduling & Rescheduling
paragraphs: ≈50-minute sessions online within UK hours.
24 hours’ notice to reschedule; late changes count as used.
Blocks may pause between sessions by mutual agreement.

sections.title: Fees & Invoicing
paragraphs: Fees in GBP, invoiced per block or as agreed.
Delivered sessions are non-refundable; unused sessions in a block may pause.
Bank/platform charges are borne by the client unless otherwise agreed.

sections.title: Data & Records
paragraphs: We keep the minimum data needed to run sessions and invoices.
You can request copy or deletion of personal data subject to legal limits.
We use common tools (Google Docs/Sheets, email, video) with reasonable care.

sections.title: Fair Use & Boundaries
paragraphs: Light check-ins are fine; heavy review or done-for-you work is out of scope.
We do not contact employers or HR on your behalf.
If there is risk of harm, confidentiality may be lifted to keep people safe.

sections.title: Disputes
paragraphs: Aim to resolve early via email and a short call.
If unresolved, we propose a simple written plan and pause if needed.
UK law and forums apply unless mandatory local law requires otherwise.

items.q: Can you explain my employment gap for me?
items.a: We co-craft your story, but you own the words. We focus on what changed and what you can evidence now.

items.q: Will you guarantee a return-to-work role?
items.a: No. Coaching is not placement. We help you create proof points and clearer stories; you apply and track results.
We coach structure and clarity to UK norms, and suggest edits together in Google Docs. You remain the author.
Usually 30–60 minutes weekly for one micro-experiment or edit pass. Keep it small and visible.
Yes. Confidential by default; minimal notes; deletion on request. See the boundaries page for details.
We plan rhythm around constraints and target roles that match your workable hours.

items.q: Can you speak to my manager or HR?
items.a: No. We help you plan the conversation; you speak for yourself when ready.
24-hour notice required to reschedule; late changes count as used. Delivered sessions are non-refundable.

cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Real situations blended from multiple returners so identities stay confidential.

items.title: Back after 3 years, worried about gaps
items.context: UK job search after a 3-year break; unsure how to frame caregiving.
items.coaching_moves: Mapped a 30-min 'first day' simulation; rewrote 4 CV bullets with CAR; rehearsed boundary language.
items.shift: Clearer language for gaps; sent 2 outreach messages with less avoidance.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Rebuilding confidence post-burnout
items.context: Returning after burnout leave; anxious about pace and expectations.
items.coaching_moves: Designed gentle energy audit; practised asking for support; set weekly review ritual.
items.shift: Communicated capacity cleanly; reported growing steadiness instead of bracing.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Translating new skills after study
items.context: Certification during break; needs hybrid-role repositioning.
items.coaching_moves: Reframed experience stories; prototyped networking outreach; tested answers.
items.shift: Entered conversations confident about naming boundaries and new value.
items.disclaimer: Illustrative and anonymised; outcomes are not promised.

items.title: Gentle 12-week ramp back with light structure and honest boundaries.
Weekly cadence; small experiments between sessions to build momentum.
Interview rehearsal that sharpens stories and fit—no hacks, no scripts.
CV/portfolio reframing to show recent proof of progress.
Simple pricing; pause between blocks; confidentiality by default.

title: Career return — coaching pathway
description: Bridge your gap with confidence. Story, evidence, cadence around care and workload.
